response.overview: RECONC?L?AT?ON was filmed in Treaty 7 territory and follows two leader women from the Piikani Nation and their efforts to engage — or not — in reconciliation in southern Alberta, through the lens of the 60’s scoop apology by the government of Alberta in 2017, and present day efforts to reconcile between Indigenous and non-Indigenous governments, communities, and agencies.
response.tagline: A film with more questions than answers
response.title: RECONC?L?AT?ON?
